headline: Assessing Hims & Hers Health (HIMS) Valuation After Compounded GLP-1 Launch And Rapid Regulatory Retreat
summary: Hims & Hers Health (HIMS) has been at the center of attention after launching a discounted compounded semaglutide weight loss pill, then quickly withdrawing it following legal threats from Novo Nordisk and heightened FDA enforcement signals. See our latest analysis for Hims & Hers Health. The regulatory backlash around compounded GLP-1 drugs has hit sentiment hard, with a 30-day share price return of 27.36% and a year to date share price return of 31.10% pointing to fading momentum despite a...
